name: M.S. Salmon
description:
The game takes place in an antropomorphic world in the late 1920’s where our protagonist Ben Hearnden, a penguin detective, has to solve a murder case on a luxury ship called M.S. Salmon.
While he collects the evidences on the ship, he isn’t only coming closer to the truth of the case, but also lighting up his own dark past. M. S Salmon is in developing for Nintendo Switch & PC Steam.
